org.jbiowhpersistence.datasets.gene.genebank.util.geneassigment

Class GeneAssignment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbiowhpersistence.datasets.gene.genebank.util.geneassigment.GeneAssignment

  • public class GeneAssignment
extends Object
    This class is assign genes using the Taxoner output file or a blast XML result file $Author$ $LastChangedDate$ $LastChangedRevision$
    Since:
    Jan 2, 2014

    • Method Detail

      • assignGenes

        public void assignGenes(String inputFileName,
               int fileType,
               int[] indToSort,
               int[] indInteger,
               int[] indToInvert)
                 throws JAXBException,
                        IOException
        Perform the gene assignment parsing the input file
        Parameters:
        inputFileName - a Taxoner output file or XML blast file name
        fileType - 1 for the Taxoner output file, 2 for the XML blast file blast file
        indToSort - array with the indexes of the columns to sort the output
        indInteger - array with the indexes of the columns to be considered as Integer
        indToInvert - array with the indexes of the columns to invert the order
        Throws:
        JAXBException
        IOException

      • assignGenes

      • printGenes

        public void printGenes(PrintWriter out,
              int[] columns)
        Print the genes assigned to the file using the selected columns
        Parameters:
        out - the output file
        columns - array with the indexes of the selected columns to print, use null to print all columns

      • printMissingGenes

        Parameters:
        out - the out file to print the missing Gi
